des: "My mother got this recipe from a friend years ago and it's become an integral part of our Thanksgiving and Christmas celebrations!  We leave it in the freezer and we all serve ourselves from there!"
ins: In a medium bowl, stir together the cranberry juice concentrate, lemonade concentrate, lemon-lime soda and bourbon. Cover and freeze overnight. It will remain slushy because of the bourbon. Scoop spoonfuls into small glasses to serve as a cocktail.
